title: Navigating Closed Doors: How COVID-19 Shut Down Essential Services
storyTranscript:
\# Navigating Closed Doors: How COVID-19 Shut Down Essential Services

\~~I really appreciate it. That's cool. Casper, what are you doing? What's what's the last few years been like? The last four years have been a bit crazy.\~~[00:00:00] 

It's just been quite difficult accessing services. I've just had to work out different ways of getting things done that I had to, thankfully, because where I used to work.

I knew we used to get a lot of people up and moving, so I know you've just got to keep moving and grooving and yeah, that was really fortunate. I come here on I've only really been coming here the last couple of months because I didn't know about it beforehand.

I found it very helpful. They do a meal, it's like a little camaraderie with a few of the guys that seem to be fairly regular and nice. We've got different ladies that volunteer here, but they also seem to be in a roster. I've seen a few of them a couple of times, and it's just nice to know the washing is washed and dried and I've set for the week.

Such a simple thing, which for me, I can wash that. I cannot go up and downstairs or hang on my clothes line. So it's been like a massive life save. It's been very helpful. \~~What's the connection like for you here? Like how.\~~

\~~I am like, like I said, I've only been a few months, but everybody seems to be unusually nice.\~~
